Articles.Content: So I am currently messing around with a mesh of the Kerbal astronaut, totally made from scratch (not "extracted" from any KSP data file), it's in my blog. I've been thinking, if I slap on some metallic (gold? hehehe) texture on it, and make it into a part, would there be KSP users interested in a mod/addon that "plants" a Kerbal statue on a planet's or moon's base, like how we do flags? Maybe the kerbal statue is striking a cool pose LOL I don't know what size to pick, but to make it visible or stand out, it has to be larger than the Kerbals themselves, right? Just playing with ideas...
